wordGroup: financial tsunami 金融海啸；金融风暴
tsunami warning system 地震海啸警报系统

sentences.en: More than 600,000 people were displaced by the tsunami.
sentences.cn: 超过60万人被海啸搞得背井离乡。

sentences.en: This could trigger a tsunami that would create havoc along the coast.
sentences.cn: 这可能会引发海啸，给沿海地区造成严重破坏。

sentences.en: You see this in the faces of tsunami and earthquake survivors on television.
sentences.cn: 你能在电视上从海啸和地震的生还者的脸上看到这个。
